duties_responsibilities.duty: Assemble and breakdown patient trays, prepare, label, and deliver supplements and nourishments.
Operate and clean tray line equipment and the dish machine in a safe and effective manner.
Serve food according to DOH guidelines, wear hairnet and gloves, and read patient menu correctly and place food on tray in a timely manner.
Clean and sanitize work stations, restock appropriately, and remove trash for warewashing.
Follow infection control procedures, maintain clean work environment, and sweep and mop floors when assigned.
Prepare nourishments according to requests, label and date nourishments and snacks correctly, and distribute snacks and supplies according to the list.
Order, portion, or obtain desired food for patron in an efficient manner and provide appropriate condiments and accompaniments for meal selection.
Maintain a level of professionalism and comply with the customers' needs and requests.
